title: Daniel Zeichner – 2020 Comments on Agricultural Payments After Brexit
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Daniel Zeichner, the Shadow Farming Minister, on 30 November 2020.
content:
If the government mishandles the transition away from existing payment schemes, it risks pushing family farms over the edge.
